landmarks.name: River
landmarks.landmark_description: You stumble upon a river with water violently moving to the east.

scenarios.scenario_description: There seem to be fish swimming in there. What do you do?

choices.choice_description: Try spearfishing with a stick nearby.

results.success: You manage to impale a pretty big fish. Nice!
results.failure: You try and try, but these fish keep avoiding your spear. Some water splashes you in the groin, and you feel quite ashamed.
